conversation.content: I need to close my account but... *sigh* I can't find where to do it...
Oh! Let me help with that—it's like a... what's the word... a hidden feature sometimes. Your account ID is ACC-4829-JL, right? I can see you've been with us since 2019.
Yeah that's right. My husband lost his job last month so we're... trying to cut expenses wherever we can...
Mmm, I understand completely. So the close option—wait no, sorry—the deactivation button is under Settings, then it's... hmm... actually let me walk you through this. Go to your dashboard first?
Okay I'm there. [exhale] This is harder than it should be, isn't it...
Honestly? Yeah it is. They don't make it obvious. Alright so, er, click the gear icon—top right, should show version 3.2.1—then scroll all the way down past the notification preferences.
I see notifications but... there's nothing about closing after that. Just terms and conditions...
Ah! That's—sorry, wrong menu. Back out. Click your profile pic instead. Should show your user number U-77492-BK at the top?
[sharp inhale] Wait, what if I already paid for next month? We really can't afford to lose that money too...

Oh good point—let me check that. Pulling up billing... your last payment of $47.99 posted November 3rd, covers through December 3rd, so you'd get, uhh... prorated refund of roughly $38 if you close today.
Oh thank God. Okay, so I clicked my profile and I see... account preferences, security, billing...
Perfect! Under billing. Then it's... huh, they moved it. Look for—no wait, try "Subscription Status" first. Should show active with code SUB-MONTHLY-STANDARD.
Found it. But it just lets me upgrade or... pause? *sigh* I don't want to pause, I need it gone...
Right right. Tricky part. Hit pause first—I know, weird—then a new option appears. It's like a... hmm... safety thing? Prevents accidental closures. Your pause confirmation number will be PC-8827-X.
This feels like they're trying to trap me... what if it keeps charging anyway...
Nah, won't happen. Once you get ticket number TKT-CLOSE-94412—that's your proof—you're protected. Actually, er, want me to handle it from my end? Takes 2 seconds.
Could you? [exhale] I just... we're already behind on the car payment and if this goes wrong too...
Already on it! Processing... done. Closure confirmed, reference CLO-7749-MK2. Refund of $38.47 hits your card in 3-5 business days. Sending email confirmation right... now.
You're sure it's completely closed? Not just paused or...

Totally closed. Status shows TERMINATED as of 14:32 EST today. Gosh, I love when I can actually fix something properly, you know? Call us at 1-800-555-9021 if that refund isn't there by Monday though, yeah?

scenario: trying to close their account but can't find the option
